programlisting:
<file:doctor-n-1> a dmlex:Sense;
  dmlex:headwordTranslation [ a dmlex:HeadwordTranslation;
      dmlex:text "Ã„rztin";
      dmlex:listingOrder "2"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
      dmlex:partOfSpeech [ 
          dmlex:tag "n-fem";
          dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt ] ],
    [ a dmlex:HeadwordTranslation;
      dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
      dmlex:text "Arzt";
      dmlex:partOfSpeech [ 
          dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
          dmlex:tag "n-masc" ] ];
  dmlex:indicator "medical doctor";
  dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt.
<file:doctor-n-2> a dmlex:Sense;
  dmlex:headwordTranslation [ a dmlex:HeadwordTranslation;
      dmlex:partOfSpeech [ 
          dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
          dmlex:tag "n-masc" ];
      dmlex:text "Doktor";
      dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt ],
    [ a dmlex:HeadwordTranslation;
      dmlex:partOfSpeech [ 
          dmlex:listingOrder "1"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
          dmlex:tag "n-fem" ];
      dmlex:listingOrder "2"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
      dmlex:text "Doktorin" ];
  dmlex:listingOrder "2"^^xsd:unsignedInt;
  dmlex:indicator "academic title".
<file:doctor-n> a dmlex:Entry;
  dmlex:sense <file:doctor-n-1>,
    <file:doctor-n-2>;
  dmlex:headword "doctor".
